content: The second stage is a series of combo attacks, where he'll use his staff and swap between a small version of the axe or a sword. When he has the sword, you can expect projectiles to follow. These can be blocked by spinning your sword or dodging.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang, The Sacred Divinity'.
The content is as follows:
The second stage is a series of combo attacks, where he'll use his staff and swap between a small version of the axe or a sword. When he has the sword, you can expect projectiles to follow. These can be blocked by spinning your sword or dodging.
